title: Effect of Three Lifestyle Interventions on Endothelial Function, Anthropometric Parameters and Cardiometabolic Profile in Obese Patients With Metabolic Syndrome: a Randomized Controlled Trial .

operands.value: men and women 30-55 years with BMI 30-40
waist 95 cm or more
normal OGTT
normal treadmill stress test
low serum levels of HDL cholesterol (<40 mg⁄dL for men or < 50 mg⁄dL for women)
hypertriglyceridemia (triglyceride levels of 150 mg⁄dL or greater)
impaired glucose homeostasis (fasting plasma glucose concentration of 110 mg⁄dL or greater or glucose of 140 mg⁄dL or greater after OGTT)
hypertension (systolic blood pressure ≥ 140 or diastolic blood pressure ≥90 mmHg or treatment with antihypertensive drugs)
Must have minimum age of 30 Years
Must have maximum age of 55 Years
diabetes
ischemic heart disease or any abnormality on treadmill stress test
inflammatory or chronic disorder
pregnancy
lactation
creatinine level of 1,5 mg/dL or more
gastrointestinal problems or musculoskeletal disorders that would prevent them to follow the test diets or exercise interventions
liver dysfunction with a factor of at least 3 above the upper limit of normal in AST and ALT levels
thyroid dysfunction, with serum TSH out of normal limits
use of immunosuppressive drugs, corticosteroids or anorexigen

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Must have maximum age of 55 Years'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 30 Years'), Symbol('men and women 30-55 years with BMI 30-40'), Symbol('normal OGTT'), Symbol('normal treadmill stress test'), Symbol('waist 95 cm or more'), Or(Symbol('hypertension (systolic blood pressure ≥ 140 or diastolic blood pressure ≥90 mmHg or treatment with antihypertensive drugs)'), Symbol('hypertriglyceridemia (triglyceride levels of 150 mg⁄dL or greater)'), Symbol('impaired glucose homeostasis (fasting plasma glucose concentration of 110 mg⁄dL or greater or glucose of 140 mg⁄dL or greater after OGTT)'), Symbol('low serum levels of HDL cholesterol (<40 mg⁄dL for men or < 50 mg⁄dL for women)')), Not(Or(Symbol('creatinine level of 1,5 mg/dL or more'), Symbol('diabetes'), Symbol('gastrointestinal problems or musculoskeletal disorders that would prevent them to follow the test diets or exercise interventions'), Symbol('inflammatory or chronic disorder'), Symbol('ischemic heart disease or any abnormality on treadmill stress test'), Symbol('lactation'), Symbol('liver dysfunction with a factor of at least 3 above the upper limit of normal in AST and ALT levels'), Symbol('pregnancy'), Symbol('thyroid dysfunction, with serum TSH out of normal limits'), Symbol('use of immunosuppressive drugs, corticosteroids or anorexigen'))))
